title: Shock resistance
data:
**[English]()**

 • [한국어](/wiki/Shock_resistance/ko "Shock resistance/ko")

**Shock resistance** is one of the vital resistances to acquire. It will protect you against the shocking attacks of [spheres](/wiki/Shocking_sphere "Shocking sphere"), [energy vortices](/wiki/Energy_vortex "Energy vortex"), [grid bugs](/wiki/Grid_bug "Grid bug"), [electric eels](/wiki/Electric_eel "Electric eel"), and blue and Chromatic [dragons](/wiki/Dragon "Dragon"). [Mjollnir](/wiki/Mjollnir "Mjollnir") and lightning bolts will not hurt you, nor will electricity traps on [chests](/wiki/Chest "Chest").

Spheres, vortices, grid bugs, dragons, eels, Mjollnir, lightning bolts, and shock traps may still detonate [wands](/wiki/Wand "Wand") and [rings](/wiki/Ring "Ring"). Shock resistance may be acquired by eating gelatinous cubes, blue dragons, storm [giants](/wiki/Giant "Giant"), [puddings](/wiki/Pudding "Pudding"), electric eels, or the [Chromatic Dragon](/wiki/Chromatic_Dragon "Chromatic Dragon"). If it's of the right material to eat, you may also get it by eating the [ring of shock resistance](/wiki/Ring_of_shock_resistance "Ring of shock resistance"). [Monks](/wiki/Monk "Monk") get shock resistance at XL 15.

## Sources

Intrinsic shock resistance can be obtained from eating the following corpses and globs:

| Monster                                                       | Conduct    | Difficulty | Chance | Notes                            |
| ------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------- | ---------- | ------ | -------------------------------- |
| [brown pudding](/wiki/Brown_pudding "Brown pudding")          | vegetarian | 6          | 7%     | acidic                           |
| [black pudding](/wiki/Black_pudding "Black pudding")          | meaty      | 12         | 7%     | acidic                           |
| [gelatinous cube](/wiki/Gelatinous_cube "Gelatinous cube")    | vegan      | 6          | 10%    | acidic                           |
| [flesh golem](/wiki/Flesh_golem "Flesh golem")                | meaty      | 10         | 12%    |                                  |
| [Chromatic Dragon](/wiki/Chromatic_Dragon "Chromatic Dragon") | meaty      | 23         | 17%    | poisonous, Caveman quest nemesis |
| [electric eel](/wiki/Electric_eel "Electric eel")             | meaty      | 10         | 47%    |                                  |
| [storm giant](/wiki/Storm_giant "Storm giant")                | meaty      | 19         | 50%    |                                  |
| [blue dragon](/wiki/Blue_dragon "Blue dragon")                | meaty      | 20         | 100%   |                                  |

Shock resistance can also be gained by being [crowned](/wiki/Crowned "Crowned") by your [god](/wiki/God "God").

## Messages

The following messages are associated with shock resistance:

- Your health currently feels amplified.

  You gained intrinsic shock resistance by eating a corpse or tin.

- You feel grounded in reality.

  You gained intrinsic shock resistance by eating a corpse or tin, while hallucinating.

- You feel insulated!

  You gained intrinsic shock resistance by gaining a level.

- You feel conductive!

  You lost intrinsic shock resistance due to level drain.

- You feel a mild tingle.

  You were shocked, but suffered no damage due to shock resistance.

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.1. Click here for more information.](/images/d/d3/Nh361-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.1. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.6.1](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.1 "NetHack 3.6.1"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-361}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
html:
Shock resistance

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
English

 • 한국어

Shock resistance is one of the vital resistances to acquire. It will protect you against the shocking attacks of spheres, energy vortices, grid bugs, electric eels, and blue and Chromatic dragons. Mjollnir and lightning bolts will not hurt you, nor will electricity traps on chests.

Spheres, vortices, grid bugs, dragons, eels, Mjollnir, lightning bolts, and shock traps may still detonate wands and rings. Shock resistance may be acquired by eating gelatinous cubes, blue dragons, storm giants, puddings, electric eels, or the Chromatic Dragon. If it's of the right material to eat, you may also get it by eating the ring of shock resistance. Monks get shock resistance at XL 15.

Sources

Intrinsic shock resistance can be obtained from eating the following corpses and globs:

Monster Conduct Difficulty Chance Notes
brown pudding vegetarian 6 7% acidic
black pudding meaty 12 7% acidic
gelatinous cube vegan 6 10% acidic
flesh golem meaty 10 12%
Chromatic Dragon meaty 23 17% poisonous, Caveman quest nemesis
electric eel meaty 10 47%
storm giant meaty 19 50%
blue dragon meaty 20 100%

Shock resistance can also be gained by being crowned by your god.

Messages

The following messages are associated with shock resistance:

Your health currently feels amplified.
You gained intrinsic shock resistance by eating a corpse or tin.
You feel grounded in reality.
You gained intrinsic shock resistance by eating a corpse or tin, while hallucinating.
You feel insulated!
You gained intrinsic shock resistance by gaining a level.
You feel conductive!
You lost intrinsic shock resistance due to level drain.
You feel a mild tingle.
You were shocked, but suffered no damage due to shock resistance.

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.6.1. Information on this page may be out of date.

Editors: After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-361}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

rawPage:
{{languages}}
'''Shock resistance''' is one of the vital resistances to acquire. It will protect you against the shocking attacks of [[shocking sphere|spheres]], [[energy vortex|energy vortices]], [[grid bug]]s, [[electric eel]]s, and blue and Chromatic [[dragon]]s. [[Mjollnir]] and lightning bolts will not hurt you, nor will electricity traps on [[chest]]s.

Spheres, vortices, grid bugs, dragons, eels, Mjollnir, lightning bolts, and shock traps may still detonate [[wand]]s and [[ring]]s. Shock resistance may be acquired by eating gelatinous cubes, blue dragons, storm [[giant]]s, [[pudding]]s, electric eels, or the [[Chromatic Dragon]]. If it's of the right material to eat, you may also get it by eating the [[ring of shock resistance]]. [[Monk]]s get shock resistance at XL 15.

==Sources==

Intrinsic shock resistance can be obtained from eating the following corpses and globs:

{|class="prettytable sortable striped"
!Monster              !! Conduct    !!                           Difficulty !!                           Chance !! Notes
|-

|-
|[[black pudding]]    || meaty      || style="text-align:right" |        12 || style="text-align:right" |    7% || acidic
|-
|[[gelatinous cube]]  || vegan      || style="text-align:right" |         6 || style="text-align:right" |   10% || acidic
|-

|-
|[[Chromatic Dragon]] || meaty      || style="text-align:right" |        23 || style="text-align:right" |   17% || poisonous, Caveman quest nemesis
|-
|[[electric eel]]     || meaty      || style="text-align:right" |        10 || style="text-align:right" |   47% ||
|-
|[[storm giant]]      || meaty      || style="text-align:right" |        19 || style="text-align:right" |   50% ||
|-
|[[blue dragon]]      || meaty      || style="text-align:right" |        20 || style="text-align:right" |  100% ||
|}

Shock resistance can also be gained by being [[crowned]] by your [[god]].

==Messages==
The following messages are associated with shock resistance:
